content: कन्यका {@--1@} A girl; संबद्धवैखानसकन्यकानि <ls>R. 14. 28</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 53.</ls> {@--2@} An unmarried girl, virgin, maiden; गृहे गृहे पुरुषाः कुलकन्यकाः समुद्वहंति <ls>Māl. 7</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 105.</ls> {@--3@} A technical name for a girl ten years old; ( अष्टवर्षा भवेद्गौरी नववर्षा च रोहिणी . दशमे कन्यका प्रोक्ता अत उर्ध्वं रजस्वला <ls>Śabdak.</ls>) {@--4@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) One of the several kinds of heroines; an unmarried girl serving as a chief character in a poetical composition; see under अन्यस्त्री. {@--5@} The sign {%Virgo%}.
कन्यका, कन्यिका {@--1@} Young girl. {@--2@} A virgin.
